text: A corporation or transfer agent does not incur liability to any person by making a transfer or otherwise acting in a manner authorized by this chapter.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 28-2906.

1973 Ed., § 28-2906.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 6 of the Uniform Act for Simplification of Fiduciary Security Transfers. See 7C Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 28-2906

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Nonliability of corporation and transfer agent.
